name: 西蒙尼·霍罗克斯
name_en: 西蒙尼·霍罗克斯 Simone Horrocks
name_full: 西蒙尼·霍罗克斯 Simone Horrocks
introduction: Director, Writer. Simone Horrocks was roughly six when her father dragged her out of bed for a sneak preview of 2001: A Space Odyssey. She was totally transfixed. After studying film in London, Horrocks worked as a camera assistant, before her 1996 short Spindrift won a prize at the Berlin Film Festival.
